verbs.description: DORAL , Fla. ( AP ) — Police : [ARG0: Officers] [V: exchanged] [ARG1: gunfire] [ARG2: with man] [ARGM-LOC: in lobby of Trump 's golf club near Miami] ; man arrested , one officer injured .
DORAL , Fla. ( AP ) — Police : Officers exchanged gunfire with man in lobby of Trump 's golf club near Miami ; [ARG1: man] [V: arrested] , one officer injured .
